overview: Meet Chrissy, she is a freshman and has just pledged the Pi Pi Sorority. Lucky Chrissy gets Kelly to be her big sister and will be in charge of her pledge training. What's a big sister to do but make sure this little freshman gets properly acquainted to the Greek life, and that means sucking and fucking every fraternity man she can find. But was state college ready for this slut and her man eating appetite? All I can say is there better be a lot of sperm ready cause this little cum guzzler can chug cum!
title: Chrissy the Campus Slut
